title: The Book of Frank
description: Winner of the 2009 Gil Ott Book Award, this expanded edition of  The Book of Frank  features additional "Frank" poems and an essay by Eileen Myles.Praised by poet Anne Waldman as a "voyeuresque surreal portrait," The Book of Frank is also, in the words of Â“candid portrayal of human cruelty and its resultant fantasies of escape."
author: C.A.  Conrad
